Description:
Detects suspicious encoded User-Agent strings, as seen used by some malware.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Base64 Encoded User-Agent
Query: (c-useragent="Q2hyb21l*" OR c-useragent="QXBwbGVXZWJLaX*" OR c-useragent="RGFsdmlr*" OR c-useragent="TW96aWxsY*")
